item.title: 字符串的排列
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 字符串的排列 题目： https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/permutation-in-string/ 思路： 滑动窗口加字典 代码： class Solution(object): def checkInclusion(self, s1, s2): counter1 = collections.Counter(s1) N = len(s2) left = 0 right = len(s1) - 1 counter2 = collections.Counter(s2[0:right]) while right < N: counter2[s2[right]] += 1 if counter1 == counter2: return True counter2[s2[left]] -= 1 if counter2[s2[left]] == 0: del counter2[s2[left]] left +=
